script.title: Expense Report - Get Registered Reports 15
script.code:
<?php

$dataResult = [];

$process_id = $data["_request"]["process_id"];
$userId     = $data["userId"];
  
/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=1&per_page=1000&include=data&pmql=process_id='.$process_id.' and user_id=' . $userId . ' and data.reportName!="" and status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus in ["New","Returned"]';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true);

    $searchResults = [];

    if (is_array($dataResult["data"]) && count($dataResult["data"]) > 0) {
        foreach ($dataResult["data"] as $key => $value) {
            $responseDataResult = getReportData($value);
            $searchResults[] = (object) $responseDataResult;
        }
    }

} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}


$reportData["value"] = 0;
$reportData["content"] = "Create new report";
$searchResults[] = (object) $reportData;
return [
    "searchResults" => $searchResults
];

function getReportData($sourceData) {
    $reportData["value"] = $sourceData["id"];
    $reportData["content"] = $sourceData["data"]["reportName"];

    return $reportData;
}

script.title: Expense Report - Get Full Expenses 12
script.code:
<?php
$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$userId       = $data["userId"];
$page         = $data["page"]
$per_page     = $config["per_page"]
$expMaxLen    = $config["merchant_length"];

//Get collection from collection id = 1
if(empty($collectionId)) {
    $collectionId = 3;
}

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
   
// Look for file URL
foreach($dataResult as &$expense) {     
    // Exeptions for Merchant Name for Expense List elements.
    $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    if(empty($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"])) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = str_repeat("-", $expMaxLen);
    }
    if(strlen($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"]) > $expMaxLen) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = substr($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"], 0, $expMaxLen) . "...";
    }

    $filteredExpenses[] = array(
        "id"   => $expense["data"]["requestId"],
        "data" => $expense["data"]
    );
}

return [
    "receipts" => $filteredExpenses
];

script.title: Expense Report - Expense Get File Path 12
script.description: Expense Report - Expense Get File Path
script.code:
<?php

$requestId = $data["requestId"];

if(empty($requestId)) {
    return ["original_url" => null];
}

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests/' . $requestId . '/files';

$res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
$files = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];

if(is_array($files)) {
    $original_url = $files[0]["original_url"];
}

return ["original_url" => $original_url];

script.title: Expense Report - Get Full Expenses 12
script.code:
<?php
$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$processId    = $data["process_id"];
$userId       = $data["userId"];
$page         = $data["page"];
$collectionId = $data["collectionId"];

$per_page     = $config["per_page"];
$expMaxLen    = $config["merchant_length"];
/*/
$processId = 28;
$userId    = 9;
$page      = 1;
$per_page  = 5;
$expMaxLen = 15;
/*/
//Get collection from collection id = 1
if(empty($collectionId)) {
    //$collectionId = 2;
    $collectionId = getCacheCollectionId();
}

if(empty($page)) {
    $page = 1;
}

//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&include=data&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"';
$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
   
$months = ["JAN","FEB","MAR","APR","MAY","JUN","JUL","AUG","SEP","OCT","NOV","DEC"];
   
// Look for file URL
foreach($dataResult as &$expense) {     
    $temp["receiptMerchant"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    $temp["receiptAmount"]   = $expense["data"]["receiptAmount"];
    $temp["receiptDate"]     = $expense["data"]["receiptDate"];
    $temp["requestStatus"]   = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $temp["reportSelected"]  = $expense["data"]["reportSelected"];
    $temp["category"]        = $expense["data"]["category"];
    $temp["category_label"]  = $expense["data"]["category_label"];
    $temp["comments"]        = $expense["data"]["comments"];
    $temp["visibility"]      = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"] == "In review"? true : $expense["data"]["visibility"];
    $temp["requestId"]       = $expense["data"]["requestId"];
    $temp["original_url"]    = $expense["data"]["original_url"];

    $expense["data"] = $temp;

    // Exeptions for Merchant Name for Expense List elements.
    $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    if(empty($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"])) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = str_repeat("-", $expMaxLen);
    }
    if(strlen($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"]) > $expMaxLen) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = substr($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"], 0, $expMaxLen) . "...";
    }

    if(!empty($expense["data"]["receiptDate"])) {
        $date = explode("-", $expense["data"]["receiptDate"]);
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateMonth"] = $months[$date[1] - 1];
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateDay"] = $date[2];
    }

    //$expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = implode("", explode(" ", $expense["data"]["requestStatus"]));

    //TEC-2250
    $expense["data"]["original_url"] = str_replace("https://plg2.plgdev.processmaker.io",getenv('HOST_URL'),$expense["data"]["original_url"]);

    $filteredExpenses[] = array(
        //"id"   => $expense["id"],
        "id"   => $expense["data"]["requestId"],
        "data" => $expense["data"]
    );
}

//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?per_page=60&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"';
//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?total=true&per_page=60&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"';
$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?total=true&per_page=1000&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    //$dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["meta"];
    $pagesCount = ceil($dataResult["total"] / $per_page);
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}

//$pagesCount = ceil(count($dataResult) / $per_page);

return [
    "receipts"     => $filteredExpenses,
    "page"         => $page,
    "text"         => $page . " - " . $pagesCount,
    "prev"         => $page - 1,
    "next"         => $page + 1,
    "top"          => $pagesCount,
    "total"        => true,
    "collectionId" => $collectionId
];

function getCacheCollectionId() {
    global $guzzleClient, $guzzleOptions;
$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/1/records?pmql=data.processName="Expense Report"';

try {
    /*/
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    return json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"][0]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
    /*/
    $res = json_decode($guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions)->getBody(), true)["data"];
    return $res[count($res) - 1]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
}

script.title: Expense Report - Get All Reports 12
script.code:
<?php

$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$button = $config["button"];

$processId  = $data["process_id"];
$userId     = $data["userId"];
$page       = $data["page"];
$pagesCount = $data["pagesCount"];
$per_page   = $config["per_page"];

/*
$processId  = 21;
$userId     = 5;
$page       = 1;
$pagesCount = 4;
$per_page   = 5;
*/

if(empty($page)) {
    $page = 1;
}

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&include=data&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and status="ACTIVE" and data.reportName!="" and data.processName="Report" and data.requestStatus in ["New","Returned"]';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];

    $reportIds = array_column($dataResult, 'id');

    $guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?include=data&per_page=100&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . '  and data.reportSelected in [' . implode($reportIds, ",") . '] and status="ACTIVE"';

    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataExpensesResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];

    foreach($dataExpensesResult as $exp) {
        $reportCount[$exp["data"]["reportSelected"]]++;
    }

    foreach($dataResult as &$report) {
        $temp["reportName"]        = $report["data"]["reportName"];
        $temp["reportDescription"] = $report["data"]["reportDescription"];
        $temp["requestStatus"]     = $report["data"]["requestStatus"];

        $report["data"] = $temp;

        $report["data"]["expensesCount"] = $reportCount[$report["id"]] ?? 0;

        $date = new DateTime($report["created_at"]);
        $report["data"]["reportDate"] = strtoupper($date->format('M d'));

        $filteredReports[] = array(
            "id"   => $report["id"],
            "data" => $report["data"]
        );
    }
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}

if(empty($pagesCount)) {
    $guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?per_page=1000&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and status="ACTIVE" and data.reportName!="" and data.processName="Report" and data.requestStatus in ["New","Returned"]';

    try {
        $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
        $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
    } catch (\Throwable $th) {
        return [
            'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
            'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
        ];
    }

    $pagesCount = ceil(count($dataResult) / $per_page);
}

return [
    "reports" => $filteredReports,
    "page"    => $page,
    "text"    => $page . " - " . $pagesCount,
    "prev"    => $page - 1,
    "next"    => $page + 1,
    "top"     => $pagesCount
];

script.title: Expense Report - Get Unreported Expenses 9
script.description: Expense Report - Get Unreported Expenses -  Version Diego TWO
script.code:
<?php
$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$processId = $data["process_id"];
$userId    = $data["userId"];
$page      = $data["page"];
$per_page  = $config["per_page"];
$expMaxLen = $config["merchant_length"];
$collectionId = $data["collectionId"];

/*/
$processId = 28;
$userId    = 9;
$page      = 1;
$per_page  = 5;
$expMaxLen = 15;
/*/

//Get collection from collection id = 1
if(empty($collectionId)) {
    //$collectionId = 3;
    $collectionId = getCacheCollectionId();
}

if(empty($page)) {
    $page = 1;
}

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . 
'&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';

/*$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&include=data&pmql=process_id=' . 
$processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';*/

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
   
$months = ["JAN","FEB","MAR","APR","MAY","JUN","JUL","AUG","SEP","OCT","NOV","DEC"];
   
// Look for file URL
foreach($dataResult as &$expense) {     
    $temp["receiptMerchant"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    $temp["receiptAmount"]   = $expense["data"]["receiptAmount"];
    $temp["receiptDate"]     = $expense["data"]["receiptDate"];
    $temp["requestStatus"]   = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $temp["reportSelected"]  = $expense["data"]["reportSelected"];
    $temp["category"]        = $expense["data"]["category"];
    $temp["category_label"]  = $expense["data"]["category_label"];
    $temp["comments"]        = $expense["data"]["comments"];
    $temp["visibility"]      = $expense["data"]["visibility"];
    $temp["requestId"]       = $expense["data"]["requestId"];

    $expense["data"] = $temp;

    // Exeptions for Merchant Name for Expense List elements.
    $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    if(empty($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"])) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = str_repeat("-", $expMaxLen);
    }
    if(strlen($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"]) > $expMaxLen) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = substr($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"], 0, $expMaxLen) . "...";
    }

    if(!empty($expense["data"]["receiptDate"])) {
        $date = explode("-", $expense["data"]["receiptDate"]);
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateMonth"] = $months[$date[1] - 1];
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateDay"] = $date[2];
    }

    //$expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = implode("", explode(" ", $expense["data"]["requestStatus"]));

    $filteredExpenses[] = array(
        //"id"   => $expense["id"],
        "id"   => $expense["data"]["requestId"],
        "data" => $expense["data"]
    );
}

//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?per_page=1000&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';
/*$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?per_page=1000&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . 
$userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"  and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';*/

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?total=true&page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . 
'&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    //$dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["meta"];
    $pagesCount = ceil($dataResult["total"] / $per_page);
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}

//$pagesCount = ceil(count($dataResult) / $per_page);

return [
    "receipts" => $filteredExpenses,
    "page"     => $page,
    "text"     => $page . " - " . $pagesCount,
    "prev"     => $page - 1,
    "next"     => $page + 1,
    "top"      => $pagesCount,
    "total"    => true
];


function getCacheCollectionId() {
    global $guzzleClient, $guzzleOptions;
    $guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/1/records?pmql=data.processName="Expense Report"';

    try {
        /*/
        $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
        return json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"][0]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
        /*/
        $res = json_decode($guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions)->getBody(), true)["data"];
        return $res[count($res) - 1]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
    } catch (\Throwable $th) {
        return [
            'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
            'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
        ];
    }
}

script.title: Expense Report - Get Unreported Expenses 9
script.description: Expense Report - Get Unreported Expenses -  Version Diego TWO
script.code:
<?php
$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$processId = $data["process_id"];
$userId    = $data["userId"];
$page      = $data["page"];
$per_page  = $config["per_page"];
$expMaxLen = $config["merchant_length"];
$collectionId = $data["collectionId"];

/*/
$processId = 28;
$userId    = 9;
$page      = 1;
$per_page  = 5;
$expMaxLen = 15;
/*/

//Get collection from collection id = 1
if(empty($collectionId)) {
    //$collectionId = 3;
    $collectionId = getCacheCollectionId();
}

if(empty($page)) {
    $page = 1;
}

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . 
'&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';

/*$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&include=data&pmql=process_id=' . 
$processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';*/

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
   
$months = ["JAN","FEB","MAR","APR","MAY","JUN","JUL","AUG","SEP","OCT","NOV","DEC"];
   
// Look for file URL
foreach($dataResult as &$expense) {     
    $temp["receiptMerchant"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    $temp["receiptAmount"]   = $expense["data"]["receiptAmount"];
    $temp["receiptDate"]     = $expense["data"]["receiptDate"];
    $temp["requestStatus"]   = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $temp["reportSelected"]  = $expense["data"]["reportSelected"];
    $temp["category"]        = $expense["data"]["category"];
    $temp["category_label"]  = $expense["data"]["category_label"];
    $temp["comments"]        = $expense["data"]["comments"];
    $temp["visibility"]      = $expense["data"]["visibility"];
    $temp["requestId"]       = $expense["data"]["requestId"];

    $expense["data"] = $temp;

    // Exeptions for Merchant Name for Expense List elements.
    $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    if(empty($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"])) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = str_repeat("-", $expMaxLen);
    }
    if(strlen($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"]) > $expMaxLen) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = substr($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"], 0, $expMaxLen) . "...";
    }

    if(!empty($expense["data"]["receiptDate"])) {
        $date = explode("-", $expense["data"]["receiptDate"]);
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateMonth"] = $months[$date[1] - 1];
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateDay"] = $date[2];
    }

    //$expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = implode("", explode(" ", $expense["data"]["requestStatus"]));

    $filteredExpenses[] = array(
        //"id"   => $expense["id"],
        "id"   => $expense["data"]["requestId"],
        "data" => $expense["data"]
    );
}

//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?per_page=1000&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';
/*$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?per_page=1000&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . 
$userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"  and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';*/

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?total=true&page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . 
'&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus="Unreported"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    //$dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["meta"];
    $pagesCount = ceil($dataResult["total"] / $per_page);
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}

//$pagesCount = ceil(count($dataResult) / $per_page);

return [
    "receipts" => $filteredExpenses,
    "page"     => $page,
    "text"     => $page . " - " . $pagesCount,
    "prev"     => $page - 1,
    "next"     => $page + 1,
    "top"      => $pagesCount,
    "total"    => true
];


function getCacheCollectionId() {
    global $guzzleClient, $guzzleOptions;
    $guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/1/records?pmql=data.processName="Expense Report"';

    try {
        /*/
        $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
        return json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"][0]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
        /*/
        $res = json_decode($guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions)->getBody(), true)["data"];
        return $res[count($res) - 1]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
    } catch (\Throwable $th) {
        return [
            'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
            'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
        ];
    }
}

script.title: Expense Report - Get Registered Reports 15
script.code:
<?php

$dataResult = [];

$process_id = $data["_request"]["process_id"];
$userId     = $data["userId"];
  
/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=1&per_page=1000&include=data&pmql=process_id='.$process_id.' and user_id=' . $userId . ' and data.reportName!="" and status="ACTIVE" and data.requestStatus in ["New","Returned"]';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true);

    $searchResults = [];

    if (is_array($dataResult["data"]) && count($dataResult["data"]) > 0) {
        foreach ($dataResult["data"] as $key => $value) {
            $responseDataResult = getReportData($value);
            $searchResults[] = (object) $responseDataResult;
        }
    }

} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}


$reportData["value"] = 0;
$reportData["content"] = "Create new report";
$searchResults[] = (object) $reportData;
return [
    "searchResults" => $searchResults
];

function getReportData($sourceData) {
    $reportData["value"] = $sourceData["id"];
    $reportData["content"] = $sourceData["data"]["reportName"];

    return $reportData;
}

script.title: Expense Report - Get Full Expenses 12
script.code:
<?php
$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$userId       = $data["userId"];
$page         = $data["page"]
$per_page     = $config["per_page"]
$expMaxLen    = $config["merchant_length"];

//Get collection from collection id = 1
if(empty($collectionId)) {
    $collectionId = 3;
}

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
   
// Look for file URL
foreach($dataResult as &$expense) {     
    // Exeptions for Merchant Name for Expense List elements.
    $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    if(empty($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"])) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = str_repeat("-", $expMaxLen);
    }
    if(strlen($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"]) > $expMaxLen) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = substr($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"], 0, $expMaxLen) . "...";
    }

    $filteredExpenses[] = array(
        "id"   => $expense["data"]["requestId"],
        "data" => $expense["data"]
    );
}

return [
    "receipts" => $filteredExpenses
];

script.title: Expense Report - Expense Get File Path 12
script.description: Expense Report - Expense Get File Path
script.code:
<?php

$requestId = $data["requestId"];

if(empty($requestId)) {
    return ["original_url" => null];
}

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests/' . $requestId . '/files';

$res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
$files = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];

if(is_array($files)) {
    $original_url = $files[0]["original_url"];
}

return ["original_url" => $original_url];

script.title: Expense Report - Get Full Expenses 12
script.code:
<?php
$dataResult = [];

/*Init Guzzle (use endpoint) and set options */
$guzzleClient = new \GuzzleHttp\Client(['base_uri'=> $_SERVER['HOST_URL'],'verify' => false]);
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Accept'] = 'application/json';
$guzzleOptions['headers']['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN');

$processId    = $data["process_id"];
$userId       = $data["userId"];
$page         = $data["page"];
$collectionId = $data["collectionId"];

$per_page     = $config["per_page"];
$expMaxLen    = $config["merchant_length"];
/*/
$processId = 28;
$userId    = 9;
$page      = 1;
$per_page  = 5;
$expMaxLen = 15;
/*/
//Get collection from collection id = 1
if(empty($collectionId)) {
    //$collectionId = 2;
    $collectionId = getCacheCollectionId();
}

if(empty($page)) {
    $page = 1;
}

//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&include=data&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"';
$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?page=' . $page . '&per_page=' . $per_page . '&order_by=updated_at&order_direction=desc&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
   
$months = ["JAN","FEB","MAR","APR","MAY","JUN","JUL","AUG","SEP","OCT","NOV","DEC"];
   
// Look for file URL
foreach($dataResult as &$expense) {     
    $temp["receiptMerchant"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    $temp["receiptAmount"]   = $expense["data"]["receiptAmount"];
    $temp["receiptDate"]     = $expense["data"]["receiptDate"];
    $temp["requestStatus"]   = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $temp["reportSelected"]  = $expense["data"]["reportSelected"];
    $temp["category"]        = $expense["data"]["category"];
    $temp["category_label"]  = $expense["data"]["category_label"];
    $temp["comments"]        = $expense["data"]["comments"];
    $temp["visibility"]      = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"] == "In review"? true : $expense["data"]["visibility"];
    $temp["requestId"]       = $expense["data"]["requestId"];
    $temp["original_url"]    = $expense["data"]["original_url"];

    $expense["data"] = $temp;

    // Exeptions for Merchant Name for Expense List elements.
    $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant"];
    if(empty($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"])) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = str_repeat("-", $expMaxLen);
    }
    if(strlen($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"]) > $expMaxLen) {
        $expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"] = substr($expense["data"]["receiptMerchant_label"], 0, $expMaxLen) . "...";
    }

    if(!empty($expense["data"]["receiptDate"])) {
        $date = explode("-", $expense["data"]["receiptDate"]);
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateMonth"] = $months[$date[1] - 1];
        $expense["data"]["receiptDateDay"] = $date[2];
    }

    //$expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = $expense["data"]["requestStatus"];
    $expense["data"]["requestStatus_style"] = implode("", explode(" ", $expense["data"]["requestStatus"]));

    //TEC-2250
    $expense["data"]["original_url"] = str_replace("https://plg2.plgdev.processmaker.io",getenv('HOST_URL'),$expense["data"]["original_url"]);

    $filteredExpenses[] = array(
        //"id"   => $expense["id"],
        "id"   => $expense["data"]["requestId"],
        "data" => $expense["data"]
    );
}

//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?per_page=60&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"';
//$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/requests?total=true&per_page=60&pmql=process_id=' . $processId . ' and data.requestCreator.id=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and status="ACTIVE"';
$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/' . $collectionId . '/records?total=true&per_page=1000&pmql=data.requestCreator=' . $userId . ' and data.processName="Expense" and data.status="ACTIVE"';

try {
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    //$dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"];
    $dataResult = json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["meta"];
    $pagesCount = ceil($dataResult["total"] / $per_page);
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}

//$pagesCount = ceil(count($dataResult) / $per_page);

return [
    "receipts"     => $filteredExpenses,
    "page"         => $page,
    "text"         => $page . " - " . $pagesCount,
    "prev"         => $page - 1,
    "next"         => $page + 1,
    "top"          => $pagesCount,
    "total"        => true,
    "collectionId" => $collectionId
];

function getCacheCollectionId() {
    global $guzzleClient, $guzzleOptions;
$guzzleApi = '/api/1.0/collections/1/records?pmql=data.processName="Expense Report"';

try {
    /*/
    $res = $guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions);
    return json_decode($res->getBody(), true)["data"][0]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
    /*/
    $res = json_decode($guzzleClient->request('GET', $guzzleApi, $guzzleOptions)->getBody(), true)["data"];
    return $res[count($res) - 1]["data"]["cacheCollectionId"];
} catch (\Throwable $th) {
    return [
        'errorCode' => $th->getCode(),
        'errorMessage' => $th->getMessage()
    ];
}
}
